name: Crashed Cats
description:
Humans with laser pointers caused you to crash. Gather and craft items to repair your ship.

Controls

  • Mouse - Look
  • Left Click - Gather
  • F - Use
  • 1-4 - Item select
  • E - Inventory
  • O - Drop Item
  • ESC - Options
  • Space - Jump

Premade assets:

substance source: Rock Surface Rough Pine Forest Floor Grass Countryside Marble tiles lobby floor
substance painter: various provided materials

Project is unfinished.
